website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung Galaxy S5 Active on AT&T is a no-compromise, ruggedized Android smartphone that will appeal to klutzes and adrenaline junkies alike.
As Samsung continues to refine its flagship Android smartphone, the Galaxy S5 is better than ever. It's the most powerful phone you can buy, and is a lock for our Editors' Choice on Verizon.
As Samsung continues to refine its flagship Android smartphone, the Galaxy S5 is better than ever. It's the most powerful phone you can buy, and is a lock for our Editors' Choice on T-Mobile.
cons: Speakerphone could be louder and deeper

website_summaries.verdict: The fitness-focused Samsung Galaxy S5 Sport is a top performer like its S5 namesake, but it adds nothing more than bloatware in exchange for nominal promotional value.

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S5 Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband as I have had one of these for the past 2 years or so. The one I bought online for my husband developed a purplish/pink flickering display and I thought at first that I would need to return it. However, I googled Pink/purple flickering display and YouTube had a fix for this which was very easy to do even though they said the fix was for the Galaxy S7 rather than the S5. I tried it and it appears to have totally cleared the problem.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent smartphone...
customer_reviews.text: The power switch on my trusty old S4 has gone after 4.5 years, so I was in need of a replacement... Requirements; Android Micro SD card capable Replaceable battery 4G Full HD screen Better than S4 performance The S5 is just about the only phone out there that meets the above criteria, and the one supplied by Techno Edge LTD was new, in a sealed box, and has been benchmarked as genuine via antutu. Great value at £200!
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Phone not working
customer_reviews.text: We think it is a faulty battery. So we have ordered another battery (extra expense) and if that does not work then the phone Is faulty. Difficult buying second hand. Have tried new battery and phone still does nto work. So I am going to return it. But pity I bought another battery.
customer_reviews.author: Professor Krish Bhaskar

customer_reviews.title: WATCH OUT FOR DODGY SELLERS!
customer_reviews.text: Its a good phone; nice interface, camera is good, feels nice to use. However the battery life is very short, doesn't last 9-5 with not that much use. Has also slowed down a lot since I got it and I've found myself waiting for it to open apps. I also bought this phone from one seller first, and they sold me a jail-broken, non-standard phone. I have sent it back and left a review on their page but watch out! Bought another from a different seller and this one is legitimate
customer_reviews.author: I Young

customer_reviews.title: Sold as a NEW phone, the condition of the phone (scratched and broken lead cover) and packaging says otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: This phone arrived with a scratched back cover. The cover for the power lead was hanging loose and broke off when the lead was put in. There was no screen cover on the phone. The box had a new sticker over another sticker. This was sold as a new phone. It is highly unlikely that this phone is new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have sworn by the S5 for years so I wasn't expecting to be disappointed..... but I was. At first the phone worked well and then the screen went blank all of a sudden and nothing would fix it. This was supposed to be reconditioned. Was it hell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the phone, only one thing really that isn't an actual issue - the CSC-Code of the device is DBT and not BTU, hence why there were German apps installed onto the device. I'm not requesting a replacement as I know how to change this, however if I buy something in the UK, I would at least like the product's default language to be English so I wouldn't have to mess about with firmware. Little rant over, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy H.

customer_reviews.title: Faulty goods - concerns about seller.
customer_reviews.text: This phone broke within 6 months - black screen of death - and the suppliers "Superior Deals" do not respond to my messages.
customer_reviews.author: Martin R

customer_reviews.title: Little Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Little disappointed as the phone was difficult to set to an O2 sim contacted seller who was quick to respond and told me although the phone is saying it's locked to verizon to ignore and continue with the set up. This was helpful but the phone still has a couple of issues and no doubt if I were to return it they would sort it out or replace it.Unfortunately my granddaughter had waited so long for the phone she won't part with it now, that is not the sellers fault.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Stephanie Wylde

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: fantastic love my new phone so many new things on it from s4 to s5 excellent camera on it with all sorts of new features on it battery a lot better always had the s4 on charge not this one also a great Manuel on it as well have down loaded all my apps still plenty of space for more if you like Samsung Galaxy you like this one
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. A. Horrobin

customer_reviews.title: Not what the doctor ordered
customer_reviews.text: Won't let me do online banking and it's stating my phone is rooted? I'm not technically minded and don't know what this means but I can guess it shouldn't be doing this.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I dont think the phone was new so returned it. The touch screen ws faulty too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shame about the very short battery life!
customer_reviews.text: Rubbish battery, you be lucky to get 6 hr's of use from full charge! When the phone it working is good but had to turn up the sensitivity of the screen.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hugh

customer_reviews.title: Great phone features but battery life not as good as ...
customer_reviews.text: Great phone features but battery life not as good as other reviews suggest. I does have a useful ultra power saving mode that turns off bluetooth closes all apps apart from phone, email and texts and goes into black and white mode. I find myself using this mode quite a bit to get me through the day. Seems a shame when you have such a nice colour screen and great apps to be tuning them off though.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy S5 smartphone
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful phone. I didn't need to contact seller for this product. Ignore my previous review in regard to this phone. I happened to buy two phones, this one for my son. He loves it. It was another smartphone I was thinking on when I did the first review. I should have looked at the picture and title more carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Steve22

customer_reviews.title: A good, mid priced phone.
customer_reviews.text: A couple of generations old, and it was my first smartphone, but I am very pleased with it. I love that you can increase its capacity by adding an SD Card. I bought a good leather case for it and fitted a glass screen cover so it should last me for some time. The only problem, which is common to all smart phones, is the limited battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A. Clift

customer_reviews.title: Fab phone
customer_reviews.text: Just love it. It does everything I want a phone to do and I can change the battery when this one eventually dies. I find in general use I need to charge it every 48 hrs which seems much better than my previous Samsung.

customer_reviews.title: know the firm before buying

I would definitely not recommend to any one. I have requested refund on Saturday 21/04/2018 but I have not heard any thing from the supplier yet.

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone is exactly what I wanted, the camera isn't top quality but not a worry if you aren't a true photographer, the frame rate can easily deal with almost all games and has a good size hard drive, able to contain many apps. This phone is great for recreational use and work. Additionally, it has an Ultra Power Saving Mode that only allows calling, texting, memo, clock and another couple of apps. Very useful if you ate planning to go on a long trip out with no plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Matthieu

customer_reviews.title: S5 phone

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished Phone did not last
customer_reviews.text: phone lasted 5 months, then some screen would only work in warm temperatures, when i was outside and the temperature is low..(most days in scotland) .. the screen would not work. I'd go back inside it would warm up and hey presto phone working again.. 90 day warranty for a refurbished phone is not enough. now phone has completely packed in so im going to have to buy a new one.. something i cannot afford!

customer_reviews.title: 👎🏻

The replacement has worked for approximately 3 weeks and has now died and won't switch on- I am assuming a battery problem.

And Google when I want to download things don't even work m I asked a refund and then take the phone back I didn't heard from them bought £200 something for a phone who don't work . I DID GIVE IT BACK TO REFUND AND STILL DIDNT BEEN REFUNDED

The quality of the back cover is horrendous... it's started chipping away after few days using it. Such a waste of time. I'm returning the handset and will let you know how that experience go...

Had to reset to factory setting and wipe clean in order to delete both shortcuts. Also the handset seems to get heated quick when using

There is no point reviewing this as all the tech gubbins has been said before but I would say this, for the price you get a fast mover, a removable battery, a great screen and a solid performance in a phone. Its a good phone, make no mistake.

Battery life is excellent, photos are good quality and it scores highly for me in all round usability. Recommend if you want a phone with plenty of extras that doesn’t break the bank.

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy S5 SIM-Free Smartphone - Black
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:BlackThe Samsung Galaxy S5 has a fingerprint scanner built into the home button so only you can access your device. There's also built in fitness software and a heart rate monitor. It's the best phone around at improving your health. The battery inside the S5 is 2,800mAh in size, giving 21 hours of talk time and up to 390 hours of standby time. The processor is a top of the range quad core 2.5GHz Snapdragon 801, excellent for gaming. Android 4.4.2 KitKat is the software, and it's feature packed. The 5.1" Super AMOLED screen automatically adjusts to different lighting conditions. On the back is a 16MP camera and on the front is a 2MP one. Both are excellent. The S5's camera lets you take some pretty special photos. It'll actually focus in 0.3 seconds. That means your 16MP photos will always be in super sharp focus. It also has a special mode called high dynamic range mode. This picks out light and dark spots on photos in perfect detail. It even works on your videos. With 16GB of built-in memory and a microSD slot for memory cards up to 128GB (cards sold separately), there's plenty of space for videos. The Samsung Galaxy S5 is packed with the latest features, and Samsung also managed to make it water resistant. Into fitness and want to improve your health? The Galaxy S5 is ideal. It'll let you track your exercises, what food you've eaten, your weight and your stress levels. There's also an excellent Coach feature that helps keep you motivated and reach your fitness goals. On the back of the S5 is a built in heart rate monitor. This lets you track your fitness more accurately than ever before.

LEGAL DISCLAIMER
Brand new phone with head phone charger no box

BOX CONTAINS

handset
charger
headphones
instructions
battery
usb cable

See more
